sentences.cn: 令人毛骨悚然的鬼故事

sentences.en: Articles were ghost-written by company employees.
sentences.cn: 这些文章由公司的职员捉刀。

sentences.en: He doesn't stand a ghost of a chance of selling the house.
sentences.cn: 那房子他根本不可能卖得出去。

sentences.en: He looked as if he had seen a ghost.
sentences.cn: 他好象见了鬼似的(很惊慌的样子).

sentences.en: He looked as if he had seen a spirit [ ghost ] .
sentences.cn: 他那副样子好像见到 鬼 了.

sentences.en: He looked as if he’d seen a ghost (= he looked very frightened ) .
sentences.cn: 他看上去像见到了鬼似的。

sentences.en: He looked so terrified that I thought he'd seen a ghost.
sentences.cn: 他看上去如此害怕,我以为他看见鬼了.

sentences.en: I suspect she'll be writing it herself; she doesn't need a ghost writer.
sentences.cn: 我觉得她会自己动笔；无需他人捉刀。

sentences.en: I thought I'd seen a ghost — it really freaked me out.
sentences.cn: 我当时以为见到了鬼─我大惊失色.

sentences.en: It got a bIt'spooky when James started telling ghost stories.
sentences.cn: 詹姆斯开始讲鬼故事的时候,有点让人汗毛直竖.

sentences.en: It wasn't a ghost; it was a real person.
sentences.cn: 那不是鬼魂，是实实在在的人。

sentences.en: My old car's finally given up the ghost.
sentences.cn: 我的旧汽车终于报废了.

sentences.en: One of the most handsome cars was a Rolls - Royce Silver Ghost.
sentences.cn: 最漂亮的汽车之一,是一辆罗尔斯 - 罗伊斯银精灵牌汽车.

sentences.en: The battery in my car gave up the ghost.
The ghost of a smile played round her lips.
The sun was warm and there was just a ghost of a breeze from the north-west.
sentences.cn: 阳光和煦，仅有一丝西北风轻轻吹拂。

sentences.en: They say the young girl’s ghost still haunts (= often appears in ) the house.
sentences.cn: 他们说那个少女的鬼魂依旧在那房子里出没。

words.tran_cn: 幽灵的；可怕的；影子似的
影子；朦胧的东西，幽灵的东西
捉刀人；撰文者；受雇代作文章的人

phrases.tran_cn: 丝毫，微量，一点儿(常在否定句中与 chance，idea 连用，或与 smile连用)

phrases.phrase: look as if you have seen a ghost
phrases.tran_cn: 看上去面无人色，惶恐不已

phrases.phrase: not stand the ghost of a chance

phrases.tran_cn: (哲)机器里出鬼（喻指身心有别或身心独立论，通常系二元论的批评者用来指身心有别论的贬抑用语）

trans.tran_cn: 鬼，幽灵，（尤指可怕事物的）记忆，隐约的一点点，（电视屏幕上的）重影
trans.tran_en: the spirit of a dead person that some people think they can feel or see in a place

trans.tran_cn: 作祟于；替…捉刀；为人代笔
trans.tran_en: to write something as a  ghost writer
